featured.text: By exhaling air from the lungs in short (36) of laughter, breathing is quickened and heartbeats increased, which achieves (37) good as ten minutes on an exercise bike.

definition.zh_def: 呼氣，將空氣從肺部排出。
definition.en_def: To breathe out; to release air from the lungs.
definition.example: After holding his breath for a few seconds, he decided to exhale slowly.
